title: Accessibility problems
description: I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.) When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything. This issue was observed on Win2K on 20020326.
OB: When launching the Help view, the tab key does not have any functionality.
SR: Ensure that the tab key has functionality when launching the Help view without having to click on a 'live' area first.
